meanings.definition: A rope or cord used to secure a tent or other structure to the ground.
meanings.sent1: The guyline kept the tent from blowing away in the wind.
meanings.sent2: Make sure to tighten the guyline to keep the tent stable.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel mistook the guyline for a tightrope and tried to balance on it.
meanings.sent4: The guyline was like an anchor, holding the tent firmly in place.
meanings.sent5: The bright orange color of the guyline made it easy to spot in the dark.

meanings.definition: A person who is skilled in a particular activity or subject.
meanings.sent1: She is the guyline of the team when it comes to problem-solving.
meanings.sent2: The chef was the guyline in the kitchen, creating delicious dishes effortlessly.
meanings.sent3: The guyline of puzzles, he could solve even the most challenging ones in minutes.
meanings.sent4: She was the guyline of the debate club, always making compelling arguments.
meanings.sent5: His expertise in coding made him the guyline of the tech department.
